001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.zeromq;
002
003import org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo.ZmqNotification;
004import org.consensusj.bitcoin.jsonrpc.BitcoinClient;
005
006import java.io.IOException;
007import java.net.URI;
008import java.net.URISyntaxException;
009import java.time.Duration;
010import java.util.List;
011import java.util.Optional;
012
013/**
014 * Utility to use Bitcoin Core JSON-RPC to find configured ZMQ notification ports.
015 */
016public class BitcoinZmqPortFinder {
017    private final BitcoinClient client;
018    private final URI rpcUri;
019    private List<ZmqNotification> notifications;
020
021    public BitcoinZmqPortFinder(BitcoinClient client) {
022        this.client = client;
023        rpcUri = client.getServerURI();
024    }
025
026    public Optional<URI> findPort(BitcoinZmqMessage.Topic topic) {
027        getNotifications();
028        return notifications.stream()
029                .filter(n -> n.type().equals("pub" + topic.toString()))
030                .findFirst()
031                .map(ZmqNotification::address)
032                .map(this::mapUri);
033    }
034    
035    private synchronized void getNotifications() {
036        if (notifications == null) {
037            try {
038                // TODO: We don't want to hang here for 120 seconds or so waiting for a server
039                // client.waitForServer(Duration.ofSeconds(1));
040                notifications = client.getZmqNotifications();
041            } catch (IOException e) {
042                // TODO: Handle this more gracefully, without runtime exception
043                throw new RuntimeException(e);
044            }
045        }
046    }
047
048    private URI mapUri(URI configuredZmqUri) {
049        return zmqPort(rpcUri, configuredZmqUri);
050    }
051
052    /**
053     * Create tcp URI for ZMQ using host of JSON-RPC client and port of URI returned with zmqnotifications
054     *
055     * @param client http URI of JSON-RPC server
056     * @param zmqPubURI ZMQ tcp URI returned with getzmqnotifications
057     * @return A tcp URI for ZMQ using host from client port from zmqPubURI
058     */
059    private static URI zmqPort(URI client, URI zmqPubURI) {
060        URI updated;
061        try {
062            updated = new URI("tcp", null, client.getHost(), zmqPubURI.getPort(), null, null, null);
063        } catch (URISyntaxException e) {
064            throw new RuntimeException(e);
065        }
066        return updated;
067    }
068
069}
